activities:
iContact is a provider of email marketing and social networking software. Most iContact customers are businesses.  However, iContact may sometimes receive personally identifiable information from its customers online, including registration, contact and payment information.  iContact’s customers may also manage certain personally identifiable information about others using iContact’s services and software; in such cases iContact is acting as the data processor and will process the personal data managed by its customers only on behalf of and under the direction of such customers, and the collection, use and disclosure of such data is subject to the customer's privacy policy.
(iContact LLC is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Vocus. Inc.)
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: online data; client and customer data
privacyprograms: TRUSTe Privacy Seal and Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program.
recoursemech: TRUSTe Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program.
